```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(bisecpp)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, cache = TRUE, collapse = TRUE);
```

```{r}
R_square(data1, f_protein, ideal.para11, extra11);

R_square(data1, f_protein, ideal.para11, extra12);

R_square(data2, f_AI2_out, ideal.para2, extra2);
```

```{r}
assess(ideal.para11, ideal.para11 * (1 + 0.1 * runif(3)));
```

```{r}
partition_fit(data1, f_protein, space1, extra11, 2, 2, 1/2, 1);

partition_fit(data2, f_AI2_out, space2, extra2, 3, 1, 1/3, 1);
```

```{r}
simulate_partition_fit(seq(60,240,60), f_protein, ideal.para11 , extra11, 10,3,1/3, 1, 3);

simulate_partition_fit(seq(0,270,30), f_AI2_out, ideal.para2 , extra2, 3,1,1/3, 1, 3);
```

```{r}
sapply(c(3:10), function(x){simulate_partition_fit(seq(60,240,60), f_protein, ideal.para11 , extra11, x,10,1/3, 1, 3)})
```
